name: CKDiscoverUserIdentitiesOperation
desc: An operation that uses the provided criteria to search for discoverable iCloud users.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an operation for discovering user identities.

items.name: init(userIdentityLookupInfos: [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo])
items.desc: Creates an operation for discovering the user identities of the specified lookup infos.

items.name: var userIdentityLookupInfos: [CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo]
items.desc: The lookup info for discovering user identities.

items.name: var userIdentityDiscoveredBlock: ((CKUserIdentity, CKUserIdentity.LookupInfo) -> Void)?
items.desc: The closure to execute for each user identity.

items.name: var discoverUserIdentitiesCompletionBlock: ((Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The closure to execute when the operation finishes.
